🚗 About BMW Concierge

BMW Concierge is an open-source companion application designed to enhance your MyBMW experience. Built with modern web technologies and integrated with GitHub authentication, it provides a secure and personalized interface for BMW enthusiasts.

🔐 Secure Access Required

To access the full BMW Concierge experience, please authenticate with your GitHub account. This ensures secure access to your personalized dashboard and vehicle management features.

✅ Welcome Back!

You're successfully authenticated. Access your personalized BMW Concierge dashboard and explore all available features.

🚀 Getting Started

  1. Authenticate: Click the "Login with GitHub" button to securely access your account
  2. Explore: Navigate to your personalized dashboard to see available features
  3. Connect: Link your BMW account to access vehicle-specific functions
  4. Customize: Set up your preferences and notification settings
  5. Enjoy: Experience an enhanced MyBMW companion application
